S06n631:1: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva ādita eva anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāvutpanne citte bahukuśalamūlasaṃbhārasamudāgataśca bhavati,
S06n631:14: so'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya prajñāpāramitāyāmabhiyukto mārān pāpīyaso'dhitiṣṭhati tena prajñābalena ca-yathā me mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso'vatāraṃ na labheran,
S06n631:18: nāpi cittamutpādayanti-kimiti vayamasya bodhisattvasya avatāraṃ gaveṣāmahe,
S06n631:23: saṃvignāśca bhavanti-mā vayaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyāma iti |
S06n631:26: anenāpi suvikrāntavikrāmin paryāyeṇa bodhisattvasya mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso'ntarāyāya prayupasthitā avatāraṃ na labhante ||
S06n631:27: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ deśyamānāyāṃ chandaśca adhyāśayaśca gauravaṃ va citrīkāraśca śāstṛsaṃjñā ca utpāditā bhavati |
S06n631:28: na ca ṣaṭpāramitāsaṃyuktāyāṃ kathāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā utpāditā bhavati,
S06n631:29: nāpi gambhāīrān dharmān śrutvā kāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ vā dhandhāyitatvaṃ vā vicikitsāyitatvaṃ vā utpāditaṃ bhavati,
S06n631:32: anye ca bahavaḥ sattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpitā bhavanti,
S06n631:34: tasya pūrvāśayacittaviśuddhitayā pūrvāśayāsaṃkliṣṭatayā na mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso'ntarāyāya pratyupasthitā bhavanti,
S06n631:39: anenāpi suvikrāntavikrāmin paryāyeṇa bodhisattvasya mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso na viheṭhāya pratyupasthitā bhavanti ||
S06n631:40: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpayoganimitte carati,
S06n631:52: na vedanā-na saṃjñā-na saṃskāra-na vijñānaviśuddhinimitte carati |
S06n631:55: na vedanā-na saṃjñā-na saṃskāra-na vijñānārambaṇaviśuddhinimitte carati,
S06n631:56: na vedanā-na saṃjñā-na saṃskāra-na vijñānārambaṇaviśuddhyanimitte carati |
S06n631:59: na vedanā-na saṃjñā-na saṃskāra-na vijñānasaṃbhavaviśuddhisaṃyoge carati,
S06n631:63: na vedanā-na saṃjñā-na saṃskāra-na vijñānārambaṇa-svabhāvaviśuddhisaṃyoge carati,
S06n631:66: na vedanā-na saṃjñā-na saṃskāra-na vijñānaprakṛtiviśuddhau carati |
S06n631:69: na vedanā-na saṃjñā-na saṃskāra-na vijñānārambaṇaprakṛtiviśuddhivisaṃyoge carati |
S06n631:71: na vedanā-na saṃjñā-na saṃskāra-na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhau carati |
S06n631:79: na rūpārambaṇātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhivisaṃyoge na vedanā-na saṃjñā-na saṃskāra-na vijñānārambaṇātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhisaṃyoge carati,
S06n631:81: evaṃ caran na rūpeṇa saṃyujyate na visaṃyujyate |
S06n631:92: na pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ saṃyujyate na visaṃyujyate |
S06n631:116: sarvadharmā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ |
S06n631:118: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin sarvadharmāḥ saṃyogena pratyupasthitā na visaṃyogena |
S06n631:121: sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi suvikrāntavikrāmin na kaścidavabodhaḥ yena saṃyujyeran vā visaṃyujyeran vā |
S06n631:122: sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi suvikrāntavikrāmin na kaścitsaṃyogāya pratyupasthito na visaṃyogāya |
S06n631:123: sacet suvikrāntavikrāmin dharmāṇāṃ kaścitsaṃyojayitā vā visaṃyojayitā vā abhaviṣyat,
S06n631:130: prajñāpayettathāgataḥ-ayamasau dharmāṇāṃ kārako vā kārayitā vā,
S06n631:136: yasmāttarhi vikrāntavikrāmin sarvadharmāṇāṃ na kaścitsaṃyogāya pratyupasthito na visaṃyogāya,
S06n631:137: tasmānna kaściddharmāṇāṃ kārako vā kārayitā vā,
S06n631:145: na ca viparyāsaḥ kenacitsaṃyukto vā visaṃyukto vā |
S06n631:152: na cātra kaściddharma upalabhyate yo'sau viparyāsa ityucyeta |
S06n631:153: viparyāsa iti suvikrāntavikrāmin vipratilambha eṣa sattvānām,
S06n631:157: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin bāladārako riktena muṣṭinollāpitaḥ saṃjānāti bhūtamiti,
S06n631:158: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin bālapṛthagjanā ucchedena viparyāsenollāpitā mūḍhā evaṃ manyante-bhūtametaditi |
S06n631:159: te abhūte bhūtasaṃjñino viparyāsagrastā durmocyā bhavanti tasmādviparyāsāt |
S06n631:160: evaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin sarvabālapṛthagjanā asaṃyuktā avisaṃyuktā bandhanabaddhāḥ saṃdhāvanti |
S06n631:167: yaḥ punaḥ saṃyogaṃ nopalabhate na manyate nābhiniviśate,
S06n631:170: sacedvisaṃyogaṃ manyeta vā upalabheta vā abhiniviśeta vā,
S06n631:172: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva imamarthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyan na kenaciddharmeṇa saṃyujyate na visaṃyujyate,
S06n631:173: nāpi kasyaciddharmasya saṃyogāya pratyupasthito bhavati na visaṃyogāya |
S06n631:174: iyaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃyogavisaṃyogaparijñā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ |
S06n631:175: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ pāramadhigacchati ||
S06n631:176: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpāsaṅgatāyāṃ carati,
S06n631:177: na vedanā-na saṃjñā-na saṃskāra-na vijñānāsaṅgatāyāṃ carati |
S06n631:179: na vedanā-na saṃjñā-na saṃskāra-na vijñānasaṅgaviśuddhau carati |
S06n631:181: na vedanā-na saṃjñā-na saṃskāra-na vijñānāsaṅgārambaṇe carati |
S06n631:184: na vedanā-na saṃjñā-na saṃskāra-na vijñānāsaṅgatāsaṃyoge carati,
S06n631:188: na vedanā-na saṃjñā-na saṃskāra-na vijñānāsaṅgatāviśuddhisaṃyoge carati,
S06n631:192: na vedanā-na saṃjñā-na saṃskāra-na vijñānārambaṇaviśuddhisaṃyoge carati,
S06n631:195: sarvāṇi hyetāni suvikrāntavikrāmin na iñjitāni nimittāni spanditāni caritāni vicaritāni bodhisattvena parijñātāni |
S06n631:197: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpātītānāgatapratyutpannasaṅgatāyāṃ carati,
S06n631:199: na vedanā-na saṃjñā-na saṃskāra-na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannasaṅgatāyāṃ carati,
S06n631:203: na vedanā-na saṃjñā-na saṃskāra-na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhau carati,
S06n631:210: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃścaryāṃ samanupaśyati |
S06n631:213: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvajñatādharmaparipūrimadhigacchati ||
S06n631:214: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpaṃ vivṛtamiti carati,
S06n631:216: na vedanā va saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ |
S06n631:221: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ |
S06n631:226: na vedanā va saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ |
S06n631:230: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ |
S06n631:232: na rūpamatītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ prakṛtiviviktaṃ vā prakṛtiśāntaṃ vā carati |
S06n631:233: na rūpamatītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ prakṛtyaviviktaṃ cā prakṛtyaśāntaṃ vā carati |
S06n631:234: na vedanā na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārāḥ |
S06n631:235: na vijñānamatītānāgatapratyuatpannaṃ prakṛtiviviktaṃ vā prakṛtiśāntaṃ vā carati,
S06n631:236: na vijñānamatītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ prakṛtiviviktaṃ vā prakṛttiśāntaṃ vā carati |
S06n631:237: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvajñatādharmaparipūrimadhigacchati ||
S06n631:238: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ na manyate |
S06n631:239: evaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān |
S06n631:256: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvajñatādharmaparipūriṃ gacchati |
S06n631:257: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva āsanno bhavati daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānām,
S06n631:261: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva āsanno dvātriṃśatāṃ mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇanām |
S06n631:269: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvabuddhadharmaparipūrimadhigacchati |
S06n631:270: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ buddhakṣetrapariśuddhimadhigacchati |
S06n631:272: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na rūpe pratiṣṭhate,
S06n631:308: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin sarvadharmāṇāṃ pratiṣṭhānaṃ vidyate |
S06n631:313: ālayo vā kūṭastho vā dharmāṇāmabhaviṣyat, ni(nya ?)
S06n631:317: yasmāttarhi suvikrāntavikrāmin sarvadharmā apratiṣṭhitāḥ anālayāḥ asaṃcayāḥ,
S06n631:319: tasmāttathāgato dharmāṇāṃ pratiṣṭhānaṃ vā ālayaṃ vā saṃcayaṃ vā na nirdiśati |
S06n631:326: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin catasṛṇāṃ mahānadīnāmanavataptāt sarasaḥ prasravantīnāṃ nāstyadhiṣṭhānamanyatra mahāsamudrāt,
S06n631:329: anabhisaṃskāra iti suvikrāntavikrāmin na tatra sthānaṃ nāsthānaṃ nādhiṣṭhānam,
S06n631:331: sthānamiti vā adhiṣṭhānamiti vā asthānamiti vā abhisaṃskāra iti suvikrāntavikrāmin gaṇanaiṣā nirdiṣṭā |
S06n631:335: ayaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya sarvadharmāpratiṣṭhānayogaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ |
S06n631:336: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvajñadharmān paripūrayati,
S06n631:342: tasmāttarhi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvena mahāsattvena arthaṃ kartukāmena,
S06n631:363: dharmacakraṃ pravartayitukāmena apravartitapūrvaṃ śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā anyena vā punaḥ kenacillokena sahadharmeṇa,
S06n631:368: sarvasattvānāṃ pūrvapraṇidhānakuśalamūlāni saṃcodayitukāmena asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ ghaṭitavyaṃ vyāyacchitavyaṃ prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyogamanuyuktena bhavitavyam |
S06n631:369: nāhaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya kaṃciddharmamevaṃ kṣipraṃ paripūrikaraṃ samanupaśyāmi sarvadharmāṇāṃ yatheha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathānirdiṣṭāyāmabhiyogaḥ pratipattiḥ asya vihārasyānutsargaḥ yaduta prajñāpāramitāvihārāya ||
S06n631:370: ye kecitsuvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti,
S06n631:371: niṣṭhā tatra gantavyā-āsannā ime bodhisattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiviti |
S06n631:372: yeṣāṃ keṣāṃcit suvikrāntavikrāmin iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā śrotrāvabhāsamapyāgamiṣyati,
S06n631:375: teṣāmapyahaṃ kuśalamūlamanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherāhārakaṃ vadāmi-niṣṭhā ca tatra gantavyā-mahāprajñāsaṃbhāropacitā hyete kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā,
S06n631:377: yeṣāṃ ca suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvānāmayaṃ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaparivartanirdeśo hastaṃ gamiṣyati,
S06n631:378: kiṃcāpi tatra kecinna vyākṛtā bhaviṣyanti saṃmukhaṃ buddhairbhagavadbhiḥ,
S06n631:381: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye sattvā daśakuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartante,
S06n631:382: niṣṭhā tatra gantavyā-āsannā hyete sattvā uttarakuruṣūpapatteḥ |
S06n631:383: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya kasyacidbodhisattvasya iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā hasyaṃ gamiṣyati,
S06n631:385: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye sattvā dānaṃ prayacchanti muktatyāgāśca bhavanti,
S06n631:386: sattvāṃśca dānena priyavadyatayā arthacaryayā samānārthatayā ca saṃgṛhṇanti,
S06n631:389: niṣṭhā tatra gantavyā-kṣipramime sattvā mahābhogā bhavantyuccakulīnāśca ||
S06n631:390: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye sattvā dānaśīlāśca bhavanti śīlasaṃpannāśca bhavanti,
S06n631:397: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya kasyacidbodhisattvasya iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā hastagatā bhaviṣyati,
S06n631:399: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya pūrṇāyāṃ pūrṇamāsyāṃ pañcadaśyāṃ purato'rthakaraṇe saṃniṣaṇṇasya cakraratnaṃ prādurbhavati,
S06n631:402: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya bodhisattvasya ayaṃ prajñāpāramitāparivarto hastaṃ gamiṣyati,
S06n631:404: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye sattvā utkṛṣṭakuśalamūlasamanvāgatāśca bhaviṣyanti śobhanasamācārāśca bhaviṣyanti,
S06n631:412: ye kecitsuvikrāntavikrāmin pariśuddhataraiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ samanvāgatā utkṛṣṭakuśalamūlāśca pūrvaṃ ca dāna dadati paścātsvayaṃ bhuñjate,
S06n631:413: prāk cānyeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtyāni kurvanti paścādātmanaḥ,
S06n631:419: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya kasyacidbodhisattvasya iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā upanaṃsyate,
S06n631:421: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye sattvāścaturṇāṃ brahmavihārāṇāṃ lābhino bhavanti,
S06n631:423: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya kasyacid bodhisattvasya ayaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśa upanaṃsyate,
S06n631:425: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin vārṣikeṣu māseṣu pratyupasthiteṣu iyaṃ mahāpṛthivī meghān pratītya snigdhā bhavati,
S06n631:430: evamiyaṃ mahāpṛthivī abhyantarā ca abhiṣyanditā snigdhā ca bhavati,
S06n631:434: te'bhiṣyanditāḥ santo bahūn śākhāpatrapalāśān muñcanti bahupuṣpaphalāśca bhavanti,
S06n631:436: evamiyaṃ mahāpṛthivī puṣpaphalotsasarastaḍāgaistasmin samaye upaśobhitā bhavati |
S06n631:437: tataśca tuṣṭā bhavanti manuṣyāśca amanuṣyāśca tāni puṣpaphalāni paribhuñjamānāstaṃ ca gandhaṃ jighrantaḥ |
S06n631:438: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yadā bodhisattvasya iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā abhimukhī bhavati,
S06n631:444: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye'navataptasya nāgarājasya bhavane sattvā upapannāḥ,
S06n631:445: te catvāro mahānadīrutsṛjati yā mahāsamudraṃ saṃtarpayanti |
S06n631:446: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yeṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā hastamupanaṃsyati,
S06n631:450: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye kecitsattvāḥ sumeroḥ parvatarājasyāntikamupasaṃkrāmanti,
S06n631:451: sarve te ekavarṇā bhavanti yaduta suvarṇavarṇā bhavanti |
S06n631:452: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yeṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmayaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśo hastagato bhaviṣyati,
S06n631:453: sarve te ekāṃ gatiṃ gamiṣyanti yaduta tathāgatagatiṃ sarvajñatāgatim ||
S06n631:454: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin sāgaro mahāsamudraḥ sarvodakasaṃdhārayitā,
S06n631:456: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya kasyacidbodhisattvasya ayaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśo hastagato bhaviṣyati,
S06n631:457: niṣṭhā tatra gantavyā-kṣipramayaṃ sarvadharmasāgaratāṃ sarvadharmabhājanatāṃ sarvadharmasamavasaraṇatāmanuprāpsyati,
S06n631:459: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin sūryamaṇḍalamabhyudgacchat sarvā diśaḥ prabhādhyāmīkaroti,
S06n631:460: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo'syāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvasattvānāṃ dharmāvabhāsakṛtyena pratyutpasthito bhavati,
S06n631:461: ihābhyudgacchan suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ kuśalamūlāvabhāsena pratyupasthito bhavati,
S06n631:466: asyāṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo'gratāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06n631:469: eṣā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin agrā śikṣā jyeṣṭhā varā pravarā anuttarā niruttarā yeyaṃ prajñāpāramitāśikṣā |
S06n631:470: asyāṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ sarvaśikṣāpāramitāṃ prāpnoti,
S06n631:474: asyāṃ hi suvikrāntavikrāmin śikṣāyāmatītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ carantaḥ śikṣitāḥ śikṣiṣyante śikṣante ca |
S06n631:475: asyāṃ ca śikṣāyāṃ supratiṣṭhitā buddhā bhagavantaḥ sarvasattvebhyo'nuttarāṃ śikṣāpariśuddhiṃ saṃprakāśitavantaḥ,
S06n631:480: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na kasmiṃściddharme śikṣito bhavati laukike vā lokottare vā,
S06n631:487: sarvadharmā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin asaktā abaddhā amuktāḥ |
S06n631:488: nāpi kasyaciddharmasya saṅgena pratyupasthitā na bandhanena |
S06n631:517: asaktā iti suvikrāntavikrāmin na teṣāṃ kaścinmocayitā,
S06n631:525: yataśca nopalabhyate yaḥ saṃyujyate vā badhyeta vā,
S06n631:541: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva āsanno bhavatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ |
S06n631:543: imāmahaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin mudrāṃ sthāpayāmi bodhisattvānāṃ saṃśayacchedāya prajñāpāramitāmabhiyuktānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratām |
S06n631:545: na pratibalā mama śrāvakā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudrāṃ paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ dhārayitum ||
S06n631:546: atha khalu bhagavān bhadrapālasusārthavāhapūrvaṃgamāni pañcamātrāṇi bodhisattvaśatānyāmantrayate sma suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ ca bodhisattvam-śakyatha yūyaṃ kulaputrāstathāgate parinirvṛte paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimikāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmāntardhānakālasamaye saddharmavipralope vartamāne saṃkṣīṇakāle imaṃ tathāgatasya anekakalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrasamudānītaṃ dharmaratnakoṣaṃ prajñāpāramitāpūrvaṃgamaṃ prajñāpāramitāprabhavaṃ prajñāpāramitāpratiṣṭhānaṃ dhārayitum,
S06n631:548: evamukte bodhisattvā bhagavantametadavocat-śakyāmo vayaṃ bhagavan imaṃ tathāgatasya anekakalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrasamudānītamanuttaraṃ dharmaratnakoṣaṃ prajñāpāramitāpūrvaṃgamaṃ prajñāpāramitāprabhavaṃ prajñāpāramitāpratiṣṭhānaṃ dhārayitum,
S06n631:550: kiṃcāpi bhagavan sa kālo mahābhayo mahākāntāro mahāghoraśca bhaviṣyati,
S06n631:551: yadbhūyasā ca tasmin samaye sattvāḥ saddharmavyavanasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇā samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti,
S06n631:552: viṣamalobhalubdhā viṣamarāgaraktā adharmarāgaraktā īrṣyālobhaparītacetasaḥ krodhanāścaṇḍāḥ paruṣāḥ durvacasaḥ śaṭhāḥ kuhakā māyāvino'dharmacāriṇaḥ kalahabhaṇḍanavivādavigrahabahulā asaṃvarasthitāḥ lubdhā lobhābhibhūtāḥ kusīdāḥ hīnavīryā muṣitasmṛtayo'saṃprajñāstuṇḍāḥ mukharāḥ pragalbhā antarhṛdayapraticchannapāpakarmāṇaḥ utsadarāgadveṣamohā avidyāṇḍakoṣatamomohāndhakārābhibhūtā mārapakṣānukūlacāriṇaḥ pratyarthikāśca bhaviṣyanti,
S06n631:553: asya gambhīrasya dharmavinayasya dharmaratnakoṣasya apratyudgatamanaḥśīlāśca bhaviṣyanti,
S06n631:554: atha ca punarutsahāmahe vayaṃ bhagavan imaṃ tathāgatasya anekakalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrakuśalamūlasamudānītamanuttaraṃ dharmaratnakoṣaṃ dhārayituṃ vācayitum,
S06n631:555: ye ca tasminnantakāle parīttaparīttā api sattvā bhaviṣyanti ebhirdharmairarthikāḥ,
S06n631:566: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmidaṃ dharmādhiṣṭhānaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśamadhitiṣṭhiti sma,
S06n631:567: mārasya ca pāpīyaso'smin dharmaparyāye mārapāśānāṃ chedāya adhiṣṭhānamakarot |
S06n631:568: atha khalu bhagavān smitaṃ prāviṣkaroti sma,
S06n631:575: mahāntaṃ ca nirnādanirghoṣamakārṣuḥ-mahādhiṣṭhānaṃ batedaṃ tathāgatenādhiṣṭhitaṃ yatrāgatirmārāṇāṃ pāpīyasām |
S06n631:576: sarvamārapāśa hi cchinnā anena dharmādhiṣṭhānena ca |
S06n631:577: teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca bhūyo mārebhyaḥ pāpīyobhyo'bhayaṃ pratikāṅkṣitavyam |
S06n631:578: ye imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyanti,
S06n631:580: māraṃ ca te pāpīyāṃsaṃ sasainyaṃ parājayiṣyanti ye imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti,
S06n631:585: baddhasīmā suvikrāntavikrāmin mārāṇāṃ pāpīyasāmasmin dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe tathāgatena |
S06n631:586: ye'tra khalu punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imaṃ dharmaparyāyamudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti,
S06n631:589: anākramaṇīyāśca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca bhaviṣyanti māraiḥ pāpīyobhiḥ |
S06n631:593: na khalu punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ saṃkliṣṭānāṃ sattvānāṃ hastaṃ gamiṣyati,
S06n631:597: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye te bhaviṣyanti hastyājāneyā vā aśvājāneyā vā,
S06n631:603: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin manuṣyājāneyānāṃ sattvānāmime evaṃrūpā dharmaparyāyāḥ paribhogāya hastaṃ gamiṣyanti |
S06n631:604: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin upoṣadho nāgarājaḥ supratiṣṭhitaśca nāgarājaḥ airāvaṇo nāgarājaḥ |
S06n631:607: nāpi te anyeṣāṃ devānāmupabhogāya paribhogāya saṃkrāmanti,
S06n631:609: yathā yathā ca śakro devānāmindro'bhikrāmati vyūhaṃ kṛtvā,
S06n631:610: tathā tathā cāpi nāgarājānastādṛśameva vyūhaṃ kṛtvā upasaṃkrāmanti paribhogāya |
S06n631:611: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin ye te bhaviṣyanti manuṣyendrāḥ puruṣendrāḥ teṣāmime dharmaparyāyā upabhogaparibhogāya bhaviṣyanti,
S06n631:613: teṣāṃ ceme dharmaparyāyā mahāvyūhā mahāviṣkārā mahādharmālokā bhaviṣyanti,
S06n631:616: asya dharmaparyāyasya ekaṃ nayaṃ ye dhārayiṣyanti,
S06n631:617: kaḥ punarvādo ye sakalasamāptaṃ lekhayitvā dhārayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti vaistārikaṃ ca kariṣyanti,
S06n631:619: parigṛhītāste khalu punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin anena dharmaparyāyeṇa bhaviṣyanti |
S06n631:622: asmin khalu punardharmaparyāye bhagavatā bhāṣyamāṇe anekairaprameyairbodhisattvairanutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhābhūt |
S06n631:624: niyatāśca te tathāgatena nirdiṣṭā abhūvan bodhāya ||
S06n631:634: sarvākāramidaṃ vadanti munayo viśvaṃ yayā saṃgatā-
S06n631:636: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat |
S06n631:637: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodho evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ || 2 ||
